column1: Pioltello (Lombard: Pioltell [pjulˈtɛl]) is a comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Milan in the Italian region Lombardy
column2: located about 7 kilometres (4 mi) northeast of Milan.

column1: Pioltello borders the following municipalities: Cernusco sul Naviglio
Pioltello is served by Pioltello-Limito railway station. Among the churches
